text: @Dantethecomic @MayorOfLA @LAPDHQ @911LAPD How are citizens going to be protected from a police officer that’s infected with COVID-19 @MayorOfLA @GavinNewsom I think you need to give @MayorOfLA a call to do something about this......... caught them in the act thank god for smartphones
